subject: Stanley Hotel event
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Allen,

Looks like plans have changed and I won't be at the Stanley Hotel 
paranormal event after all.  There was some sort of disconnect and my 
name didn't show up on the guest list, so they couldn't give me a 
room there. That's what the hotel supervisor said last night 
anyway... and it's too late in the game to follow this up.
He did say about 245 people will be in attendance, so you should have 
a good time.
Frank Sumption and I were both on their speaking agenda to talk and 
use some new devices for half the group at a time, but I heard Frank 
might not be able to make it either.

I hope to meet you and April at a future event sometime...

- Mike (UFO Geek)
http://www.ufogeek.com

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Allen" <amuck944@...> wrote:
>
> Mike,
>
> I like the microphone. What did you use if you don't mind giving
> specifics?
>
> April and I will be at the Stanley also. We will be selling TAPS
> merchandise and magazines. Stop by if you get a chance. We would
> like to meet you.
>
> Allen Slaughter
